sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Wreath-laying ceremonies and processions across Europe on the 105th anniversary of the first Armistice Day, commemorating all those who died in World War I.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Saudi Arabia hosts an emergency Arab-Islamic summit aimed at ending the war in Gaza before it sparks further conflict in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Somber scenes in Paris as rows of French troops marked the 105th anniversary of Armistice Day. SOMBER SCENES IN PARIS AS ROWS OF FRENCH TROOPS MARKED THE 105TH ANNIVERSARY OF ARMISTICE DAY.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: PRESIDENT EMMANUEL MACRON VISITED THE ARC DE TRIOMPHE ON SATURDAY WHERE HE HONORED THE ETERNAL FLAME, COMMEMORATING ALL THOSE WHO DIED IN WORLD WAR I, THE WAR THAT WAS SUPPOSED TO END ALL WARS. THIS AS UKRAINIAN TROOPS ARE FACING THEIR SECOND WINTER FIGHTING AGAINST RUSSIA'S FULL-SCALE INVASION, WHILE IN THE MID-EAST ISRAEL'S INCESANT BOMBING CAMPAIGN IN GAZA This is Ukrainian troops are facing their second winter fighting against Russia's full-scale invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While in the Mideast, Israel's incessant bombing campaign in Gaza is entering its sixth week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Across the British Channel, there was similar pomp and flair in London.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to the National Archives, more than one million British military personnel died during the First and Second World Wars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At 11am, a two-minute silence was accompanied by a wreath-laying ceremony at the Cenotaph.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: These military marches are coinciding with what is expected to be the largest pro-Palestinian rally in the capital since the Israel-Hamas war began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators are calling for an immediate ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Israel has launched new attacks on targets in Lebanon and Syria. Hezbollah said seven

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: of its fighters were killed in Lebanon. The Israel Defense Forces, or IDF, claimed it hit a Syria-based organization it said was behind a drone attack on a school in Eilat on Thursday. An IDF spokesman said it was operating in any area that threatened Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visited IDF forces, including an artillery base, and also met injured soldiers at a medical center in Ashkelon, telling them their friends were hitting Hamas hard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hamas says the death toll, mainly Palestinian civilians, has surpassed 11,000 in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the Saudi capital Riyadh, Syria's president arrived ahead of an emergency summit of the Arab League.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It has called for a complete ceasefire in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Saudi Arabia is hosting an Arab-Islamic summit aimed at unifying efforts to end the war between

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Israel and Hamas militants before the conflict draws in other countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Arab League and Organization of Islamic Cooperation were initially scheduled to hold their meetings separately, but the Saudi foreign ministry announced early on Saturday that the two summits would be held jointly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The meeting comes five weeks into the conflict that has already claimed the lives of more than 12,000 people, most of them civilians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Aid groups have joined pleas for a ceasefire, warning of a humanitarian catastrophe in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But Israel and its main backer, the United States, continue to rebuff their demands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Between the artillery rounds on the Russian MOD pictures, camera shutters are clearly audible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Moscow's version, a Ukrainian stronghold in Zaporizhia being destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Explosions far away in Ukraine's capital today, where, according to its air defences, drones being downed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Now, in our time, the world is at the crossroads. Local wars can provoke a global collapse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The suffering in which a particular nation is thrown can drag neighboring nations into the abyss.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As President Zelenskyy speaking in English reminds the rest of the world it cannot afford to ignore Ukraine's existential fight, its own pictures show its soldiers training for one of the many fronts. AFP's independent pictures show bitter fighting on one of those fronts near Herson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least 31 people have been injured in an explosion at an asylum seeker reception centre

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: in the central Italian town of San Lorenzo Nuovo. The blast came just before midnight on Friday, destroying the building where dozens of people, most of them men, were housed in mini apartments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: One person was seriously injured and was taken to hospital in Rome by helicopter. The fire brigade said in a statement that the explosion was probably the result of a gas leak. An investigation is underway.
